name: Something in a Fanzine
description:
Your friend Something just stormed out of what was supposed to be a calm conversation you two were having. They said you, Will, were overstepping or whatever. What has gotten into them? They left the last issue of the silly school fanzine they have been contributing to. Maybe there are some answers there…

This game was made in three days during the Inkjam 2021, using Inky editor!

Designer: Echopteryx
Writer: Florence Rivières
Visual artist: Naïlys Kaboom
Music & Sound Designer: Aurélien Montero
Voice: Laurent Gris
Mama-san & correction: Sasha_JP
